id3VybDovL2RvY3MudjEvZG9jOjBmZDk3NTczNWN.value: Following the cross-border legal merger of Peugeot S.A. with and into Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. (the “merger”), the Company was renamed Stellantis N.V.

Stellantis and its subsidiaries are engaged in the design, engineering, manufacturing, distribution and sale of automobiles and light commercial vehicles, engines, transmission systems, metallurgical products and production systems. In addition, Stellantis is also involved in certain other activities, including (mainly captive) services, which represent an insignificant portion of its business.
